name: coprocessor
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
computing
  specialized a computer processor (= a part of a computer that performs operations) that can be used together with the main processor, especially to do particular tasks: A maths coprocessor is highly desirable for large data sets. The machine also includes a graphics coprocessor. On a device fitted with a co-processor, the calculation time is under 1 second.
More examplesFewer examplesThe microprocessor includes an integrated maths coprocessor as standard.The video coprocessor is used when in extended graphics mode. Supplemental memory resources can be run on the coprocessor.The products require an additional co-processor. To be an efficient server, the mainframe needs a network co-processor.
